issue.title: [Release] Add crossbow task to verify ARM64 wheels on travis
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12553](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12553). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Although we're going to ship ARM64 wheels with release 4.0 we have not verified them using the automatized crossbow tasks. We should cover those binaries as well.
